de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.external

Class FileBasedSparseFloatDistanceFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractDatabaseDistanceFunction<DBID>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractDBIDRangeDistanceFunction
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.external.FileBasedSparseFloatDistanceFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBIDDistanceFunction, DBIDRangeDistanceFunction, DistanceFunction<DBID>

    @Alias(value="de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.external.FileBasedFloatDistanceFunction")
public class FileBasedSparseFloatDistanceFunction
extends AbstractDBIDRangeDistanceFunction
    Distance function that is based on float distances given by a distance matrix of an external ASCII file.

    Note: parsing an ASCII file is rather expensive.

    See AsciiDistanceParser for the default input format.

    TODO: use a float[] instead of the hash map?

    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Elke Achtert, Erich Schubert
